title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Avalanche (AVAX) Surges 8.2% as All Assets Rise
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polkadot (DOT) was also a top performer, gaining 8.1% from Wednesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2795.83, up 3.2% (+86.05) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: AVAX (+8.2%) and DOT (+8.1%).

Laggards: Laggards: SOL (-5.6%) and UNI (-4.3%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news reports that all 20 assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading higher with significant gains for top performers like AVAX and DOT.
